peopleAlsoAsk.question: Is jade stone valuable?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Chinese jade is expensive due to its rarity, beauty, and history. China was the first culture to master the art of carving jade, and they had the highest standards for which stones to use. Several qualities of the stone add to its value, and one of the most important factors is jade's rarity.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: Why Chinese Jade Is so Valuable? - Weisbrod Collection

peopleAlsoAsk.question: What color jade is the most valuable?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: The most valuable jade color is known as “imperial jade” and occurs only in jadeite. Imperial jade is a green balanced between blue and yellow hues.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: Nephrite Jade Value, Price, and Jewelry Information - Gem Society

peopleAlsoAsk.question: How do I value my jade?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: This is often called 3C2T: Color, Clarity, Craftsmanship, Translucency and Texture. These are widely acknowledged as the key factors of valuing jade jewelry. Branding is also important. It might not necessarily directly affect the market value of the jade gemstone itself, but it could still influences the final price.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: Which Type of Jade is The Most Valuable?
